name: SMASH IT
description: You're a young kid who likes to Smash anything and everything in his path. Smash as many objects as you can to be the worlds best Smasher!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD Turion Dual-Core RM-75 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Storage: 50 MB available space MB available space Sound Card: M-Audio AV40
